name: The Legend of Dark Witch 2
description: Created by indie games company INSIDE SYSTEM in 2014, Legend of the Dark Witch 2 is a 2D action story sequel to the "Legend of the Dark Witch for 3DS". True to its predecessor, Legend of the Dark Witch 2 retains its simple controls and enough challenges to satisfy the completist. Game system Players have 8 stages to choose from and must use SHOTs to make their way through a variety of obstacles to reach the boss enemy. Within each stage there are hidden "Pura Syega" which are helpful to power up player characters. New Features ・Increased number of stages to choose from ・Allows finer customization for player stats using "Tres" ・"Technical skills" can be customized not only to increase power, but add abilities as well ・New "Forbidden" items added for a wider variety of game play
